about_the_game:
Embark on a captivating and chilling journey in Neon Goddess, a retro 3D horror game that plunges you into a dark cyberpunk world intertwined with Lovecraftian cosmic horrors. Inspired by classic horror titles from the '90s and 2000s, Neon Goddess offers a unique experience with challenging gameplay and an immersive storyline.

Story:

In the dystopian backdrop of Neon Goddess, powerful cultist corporations divide a world where technology and religious fanaticism coexist. Assume the role of Astrid, a genetically modified mercenary entangled in moral dilemmas while navigating dangerous eldritch cults, possessed robots and an oppressed resistance. Your choices will shape not only Astrid's destiny but also the course of the world around her.

Key Features:

  • Challenging Gameplay: Confront grotesque enemies and solve intriguing puzzles in a claustrophobic and perilous world.
  • Choice System: Your decisions directly impact the narrative, leading to multiple possible endings.
  • System Hacking Mechanics: Unique hacking abilities add a strategic layer to gameplay, altering the behavior of enemies, objects, and the environment itself.
  • Complex Characters: Meet mysterious cultists, each with their own story and motivations, as you decide whom to trust or betray.

Intense Exploration:

Uncover the mysteries of a dystopian world by exploring underground tunnels, abandoned cities, and sinister laboratories. The threat of the unknown is ever-present, and every choice impacts Astrid's journey.



Get ready to dive into a cyberpunk nightmare and discover how far your choices can take you. Astrid's fate is in your hands.
